description: Number of series-parallel networks with n labeled edges, multiple edges not allowed.
references: J. W. Moon, Some enumerative results on series-parallel networks, Annals Discrete Math., 33 (1987), 199-226 (the sequence V_n).
links: Index entries for sequences mentioned in Moon (1987)
formula: E.g.f.: -2*LambertW(-1/2*exp(-1/2)*(1+x)^(1/2))-1. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 21 2006a(n) = sum(m=1..n, (sum(k=0..m-1, (m+k-1)!*sum(j=0..k, ((-1)^j *sum(l=0..j, (2^(j-l)*(-1)^l*stirling1(m-l+j-1,j-l))/(l!*(m-l+j-1)!)))/(k-j)!)))*stirling1(n,m)). [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Feb 17 2012]a(n) ~ n^(n-1) / (sqrt(2) * (4-exp(1))^(n-1/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 09 2013
mathematica: max=19; f[x_] := -2*ProductLog[-Sqrt[1+x]/(2*Sqrt[E])]-1;CoefficientList[Series[f[x], {x, 0, max}], x]*Range[0, max]! (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 21 2012, after Vladeta Jovovic *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 19 2000
